title: (x) cartoony "Your Invitation" - ITC Snap (squooshed) {Jan} - help needed
content:
Guys, Been through our font catalogs, old letraset books etc, and can't identify the attached... annoying thing is I know I know it!   
Your my last hope! ![Cartoony font](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224313im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39107.jpg)
author: chough

comments.content: Nice one Jan! that'll do it!
